exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure with flexible program
isosensitivity: Auto (auto gain ISO 100-800) and Fixed range auto (ISO 100-200, 100-400)
label19: USB, DIgital I/O, HDMI, Audio/video (A/V) output
label11: exposure compensation (-3.0 to +3.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
label15: 4 sec. (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
label6: 94MB camera memory + SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card Support
continuousshootingspeed: Up to 90 shots at approx. 1.2 frames per second
exposuremetering: 256-segment matrix, center-weighted, spot, spot AF area (with support for 99 focus areas)
